Data Fields
device_adc_cfg_t Struct Reference
Device Configuration

Data structure for an analog input device (up to 16 channels) More...

#include <device.h>

Collaboration diagram for device_adc_cfg_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines the data for an analog input device with up to 16 inputs.

Data Fields

uint16_t reference
 The reference voltage in millivolts.
 
int8_t channels [DEVICE_MAX_ADC_CHANNELS]
 The channels to use (-1) if not used.
